app.header: Hi, I am Farhod a Front-end Web Developer
app.name: Full name
app.about.desc: Hi! My name is Farkhod, I am a Front-end developer with more than 2 years of experience. I speak HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React frameworks. Worked in projects for companies such as Start-Rise and Tech-Data-Soft. I like to create beautiful and functional interfaces that help improve the lives of users. I will be glad to cooperate and new projects!
